item.title: Maulana Masood Azhar, The Terror Mastermind and Most Wanted by India
item.description: Maulana Masood Azhar is one of the world’s most dangerous and most wanted terrorists, known for orchestrating multiple deadly attacks against India. As the founder of Jaish-e-Mohammed (JeM), a UN-designated terrorist organization, Azhar has spent decades fueling jihadist violence, especially in the Indian region of Jammu and Kashmir. His name is synonymous with some of the worst terror incid
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
